critique: This document is an executive order delegating authority related to the transfer of functions, personnel, records, and property related to the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to the Director of the Bureau of the Budget. It also revokes a previous executive order. There is no mention of immigration, civil liberties, or social issues. It seems to be an administrative action. Therefore, the ideological tilt is neutral. The immigration approach is not applicable. The executive power is neutral as it is a delegation of authority, not an expansion. The federalism aspect is neutral. The national security vs. civil liberties aspect is not applicable. The economic regulation aspect is neutral. The social inclusion aspect is not applicable.
